>Ok, that inspired me. The events page should be fully up to date as of this

>So far, I've planned the following for the new login script:
>
>- Everything the current one offers.
>- Members will be able to post fanfiction and fanart without having to go 
>through the slow proccess of having me put it up.
>- The council will be able to create polls and update the site.
>- If KSL wants is fine with it, I can implement a member profile thing much
